Text:

duhprane - sorry but you are very misinformed.  911 is a special day for Muslims.  Something specific happened (I can't remember just what right now) on that month and day many years back so it is a holy day to them.  It was perfectly planned by them (the Muslims) to occur on that day.  Logic and the fact that the Muslims admit to it seem to indicate it wasn't a conspiracy.  What have we to gain from ruining our economy by blowing up our trade towers and ruining our defense capabilities by blowing up the Pentagon.  Are you that retarded or do you just like to believe everyone is out to get you.  Use some common sense.  I don't claim the US government is perfect but they have our best interests in mind.  They try to prevent wars not start them.  Seriously, I don't get you people.
